Orlando, Florida
Orlando is a city in the U.S. state of Florida and the county seat of Orange County.

As one of the world's most visited tourist destinations, Orlando's famous attractions form the backbone of its tourism industry: Walt Disney World, the Universal Orlando Resort. With the exception of Walt Disney World, most major attractions are located along International Drive.
